title: Fire kills at least 26 people in drug treatment centre in capital of Azerbaijan
text: March 2, 2018 / 7:05 AM / Updated an hour ago Fire kills 24 people in drug treatment centre in Azerbaijan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BAKU (Reuters) - A fire killed 24 people in a drug abuse treatment centre in Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, its General Prosecutorâ€™s office said on Friday. A firefighter carrying fire hoses walks near the scene of a fire which broke out in a drug abuse treatment center in Baku, Azerbaijan March 2, 2018. REUTERS/Aziz Karimov Slideshow (4 Images) Eldar Sultanov, spokesman for the office, said 31 people had been rescued during the incident. Azeri officials said the fire had probably been caused by a problem in the power network of the building containing the centre. Reporting by Nailia Bagirova; writing by Polina Nikolskaya and Polina Devitt; Editing by Kevin Liffey
